page.title: 03Activity Centre
page.content: { }Manor Farm Activity Centre,East Lydford,provides basic instruction and experience for adults and children in a wide variety of sports. Holidaymakers from far and wide can enjoy up to 30 different activities including climbing,abseiling,swimming,canoing and horseriding.Archery is taught by Sqdn Ldr Gilchrist who runs the Centre with,in termtime a mountain leader and in summer,6 instructors. Each week in summer,40-50 children aged 9-14 attend the 4 acre Centre, many staying in the dormitory block next to the 17th century thatched house.They come from many backgrounds to enjoy fresh experiences and learn sporting skills which they can use in later years.Local children can use the facilities once a week.
